Darin, please consider adding this one for RC3.  I propose to add isDispose checks to the table viewers.

Thanks...
Samantha

Marking as RC3 candidate. Since the updates are run async as UI jobs, the table can be disposed before the job runs. Simple 'isDispsosed' check fixes both problems.

CC'ing Markus for approval.

Created an attachment (id=40313)
patch to org.eclipse.debug.ui

added isDisposed checks to viewers

Darin, please review patch before I check it in.  Thx.
Sam
